La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SR DE COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cachimayo, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Mercedes; tiene 48 años de edad, y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, ella vende desde las 5:00 a.m hasta 6:00 p.m, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar y leche, la socia quiere mejorar la tienda de abarrotes. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para la tienda de abarrotes. 

 La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "SR DE COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO" communal bank.  It is located in the district of Cachimayo which belongs to the Anta Province in the department of Cusco.

Mrs. Mercedes is 48 years old, and married with four children.  She alternates her daily activities with a grocery store she runs from 5:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m.  

She sells basic items such as rice, sugar and milk, but would like to improve her store.  She is requesting a loan to buy more products for the grocery store.

loans.use: To buy grocery store products.

loans.name: Castulo

texts.es: Castulo tiene 45 años, es un joven soltero responsable, vive en casa de sus padres, cuidándolos. Castulo, recorriendo las calles de su distrito, se dedica a la venta de ropa casual, ya que es su principal actividad económica, es un vendedor muy convincente, carácter que le da mucha ventaja al momento de vender sus productos. Las prendas de vestir y los zapatos que ofrece, son  de marca garantizadas en el mercado; por ello los  termina de vender rápidamente, a pesar de cobrar un poco más que las tiendas. Se siente  contento por la rentabilidad de su negocio,  ya que solo así; está al pendiente de sus padres. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo, es que conoce mucha gente que se convierten en sus amigos, es así que viene trabajando desde hace 15 años en esta labor; con el tiempo, desea incrementar y diversificar  más su negocio. Es su 11avo  crédito con MFP, sabe que este crédito que recibirá, le será muy beneficioso para su negocio, es por ello que se compromete en pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el crédito que solicita, lo invertirá en el incremento de más prendas de vestir, para abastecerse para la temporada que se avecina.
texts.en:
Castulo is a 45 year old responsible single man who lives with and takes care of his parents.  He is a door-to-door salesman in his district where his main business is selling casual clothing.  He is a very convincing salesman and uses his personality to his advantage when selling his products.

The clothing and footwear he sells are well-known brands, so sales go quickly even though the price is slightly higher than through stores.  He is happy that the business is profitable, allowing him to attend to his parents' needs.  What he likes most about his job is the fact that he gets to meet many people who later become friends.  He's been working in this activity for 15 years and plans to increase and diversify business in the future.  

This is the 11th MFP loan he has received and he knows this new one will be very beneficial for his business.  He is committed to paying back the loan on time.  He plans to use it to buy more clothing for the upcoming season.

loans.use: To buy clothing and footwear.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SR DE COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cachimayo, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Francisca; tiene 58 años de edad, y es casada y tiene 10 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de loseria, ella vende platos, tazas y ollas, la socia tiene una pequeña tienda de loseria en la provincia de Izcuchaca, la socia atiende desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería de loseria.

 La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the "SR DE COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO" communal bank.  The bank is located in the Cachimayo District which belongs to Anta Province in the department of Cusco.

Mrs. Francisca is 58 years old and married with 10 children.  She alternates her daily activities with her pottery business where she sells dishes, cups and bowls.  She has a small pottery shop that is open from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.  She would like to use the loan to buy pottery products and expand her business.

The member is grateful for the loan and is committed paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy pottery products.

loans.name: Catalina Maruja

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SR DE COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cachimayo, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Catalina Maruja; tiene 58 años de edad, y es casada y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa para niños, ella tiene un puesto en un centro comercial de la ciudad de Cusco, ella trabaja desde las 9:00 p.m  hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa de niños como pantalones, polos y chompas.

 La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “SR DE COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO” Banco Comunal, which is located in the district of Cachimayo, which belongs to the Anta province in the department of Cusco.

Her name is Señora Catalina Maruja; she is 58 years old, married and has five children. She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling children's clothes. She has a stall in a market in the city of Cusco and she works from 9:00am to 7:00pm. Señora Catalina Maruja wants to expand her clothes selling  business. She is requesting a loan to buy children's clothing such as pants, t-shirts and sweaters.

She is grateful for this loan and committed to making her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy children's clothing such as pants, t-shirts and sweaters

loans.name: Jhoyse

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SR DE COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cachimayo, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Jhoyse; tiene 30 años de edad, y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa para niños, ella tiene un puesto en un centro comercial de la ciudad de Cusco, ella trabaja desde las 9:00 p.m  hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ropa. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa de niños como pantalones, polos y chompas.

 La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “SR DE COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO” communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Cachimay, part of Anta province and the department of Cusco.

The member is Sra. Jhoyse, age 30. She is married and has 3 children. She divides her time between her daily household activities and her business selling children’s clothing. She has a stall in a commercial area in the city of Cusco. She works from 9:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m. She wants to enlarge her clothing sales business.

Sra. Jhoyse is applying for the loan in order to purchase children’s clothing such as trousers, polo shirts, and sweaters. She is thankful for the loan and promises to make all her payments on time.

loans.use: In order to purchase children's clothing such as trousers, polo shirts, and sweaters.

loans.name: Kadiatu

texts.en:
Kadiatu K., age 52, established a business in 2000 selling gara lappers, bedding, and other such items. She began her business to increase her income, raise her profit, and improve her family's standard of living. Working seven days a week and eight hours a day, she earns about Le 1,200,000 every month from this business. 

She would like to obtain a loan in the amount of Le 3,000,000 in order to add more stock and to buy raw materials for her business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 300,000. In the future, Kadiatu K. plans to establish a savings account and educate her children to university level. She also wants to use part of her profit to support her husband, with whom she has six children, aged 10, 15, 17, 20, 23, and 25. She has one additional dependent who lives with her because she educates her.

She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To add more stock and to buy more raw materials for her business

loans.name: Rosa Cecilia

texts.es:
Rosa de 36 años, tiene una pequeña tienda, vive con su esposo y tres hijos de 16, 14 y 6 años tiene una pequeña tienda, vive con su esposo y tres hijos en el suburbio de Guayaquil zona caracterizada porque la mayoría de sus habitantes son comerciantes. 

Debido a que se caso muy joven y su situación económica no era tan buena ella invirtió  sus ahorros en víveres de primera necesidad para tener su propia tienda. Comenzaron la tienda con algunos víveres y a pasar más tiempo con ayuda de su hijo ayer y esposo pudieron surtirla. En la actualidad tiene en su tienda con lácteos, frutas, granos, bebidas etc. Trabaja desde las 06h30am hasta las 22h30. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar arroz, enlatados, bebidas para su tienda. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa y tener una tienda más grande para asegurar el futuro de su familia.
texts.en:
Rosa is 36 years old and has a small store.  She lives with her husband and her three children ages 16, 14, and 6, in the suburbs of Guayaquil, an area where many of the residents are shop owners.

As she married very young and her financial situation was not very good, she invested all over savings in basic food items in order to set up her own shop.  Se started her store with a few basic items and over time with the help of her son and husband she was able to increase her stock.  Currently her store has dairy, fruit, grains, drinks, etc.  Se works from 6:30am until 10:30pm.  

With this loan she wants to purchase rice, canned goods, and drinks for her store.  In the future she hopes to finish building her home and to have a bigger store to secure her family's future.

loans.use: Sugar, rice, canned goods

loans.name: Magnolia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “LOS DIAMANTES”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Magnolia; La socia tiene 37 años de edad, ella es conviviente; y tiene 1 hijo, la socia trabaja en un laboratorio y también ella puso su propio negocio, la socia tiene un restaurante desde hace 5 años, la socia desea implementar su negocio y poder mejorar su calidad de servicio y su local, ella comprara insumos, muebles  (mesas para el negocio y sillas). La socia invertirá el dinero en mejorar su negocio e implementar.

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank “LOS DIAMANTES”, which is located in the Huanchac district in the province and state of Cusco.

Mrs. Magnolia is 37 years old and lives with her partner.  She has 1 son.  She works in a laboratory and also started her own business; a restaurant she opened 5 years ago.  She wants to invest in her business to improve the quality of service and the locale.  She will purchase ingredients, furniture (tables for the business and chairs).  She will use the money to improve her business. 

She values and is thankful for the loan provided through this organization, and promises to make her payments in the established time frame.

loans.use: She will use her money to improve her business.

loans.name: Delicia

texts.es: Delicia, de 52 años, vive en una casa alquilada, en compañía de sus 4 hijas. Recorriendo las calles de su ciudad, Delicia vende cosméticos, es una buena vendedora y muy convincente, por lo que termina de vender muy rápido sus productos. Por tal motivo, siempre procura abastecerse de varios cosméticos para así poder cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes. Le gusta mucho su trabajo, pues le es muy rentable, sobre todo en cuando ofrece por catálogos, es ahí donde aprovecha por las ofertas e incentivos que la empresa le da. En este negocio ya lleva muchos años, por lo que tiene como meta, comprarse un puesto en el mercado, para que pueda desarrollar su trabajo con tranquilidad. Es su 11avo crédito con MFP y seguirá siendo puntual con el pago de sus cuotas, puesto que desea tener nuevos créditos. En su grupo comunal, es un socia responsable y preocupado por el bienestar de su grupo comunal. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará productos de belleza, para continuar trabajando en su negocio.
texts.en: Delicia, 52 years old, lives in a rented home with her 4 daughters.  Crisscrossing the streets of her city, Delicia sells cosmetics.  She is a good saleswoman and very convincing, so she sells her products very quickly. She therefore always tries to stock various cosmetics to be able to full her customers' orders.  She likes her work a lot because it is very profitable, especially when she sells via catalogs, where she can take advantage of the sales and incentives that the company provides.  She has had this business for many years, so she has the goal of purchasing a stand in the market, so that she can work more calmly.  This is her 11th loan with MFP and she will continue to make her payments punctually, in order to have future loans.  In her communal bank, she is a responsible member and concerned for the well being of the group.  With the loan she is requesting, she will purchase beauty products for her business.

loans.use: Purchase stock of beauty products.

loans.name: Eugenia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SR DE COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cachimayo, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Eugenia; tiene 44 años de edad, y es casada y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ganado (vacas), ella los vende en diferentes lugares como Urubamba, Calca y Anta, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar 2 ganados

 La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank “SR DE COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO”.  The bank is located in the Cachimayo district, in the Anta province, state of Cusco.

Mrs. Eugenia is 44 years old, married, with 5 children.  She varies her daily activities according to her business buying and selling cattle (cows).  She sells them in various places such as Urubamba, Calca, and Anta.  She wants to expand and improve her business.  She is requesting a loan to purchase 2 cattle. 

She is thankful for the loan and promises to make her payments in the established time frame.

loans.use: The member is requesting a loan to purchase two cattle.

loans.name: Marleni

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SR DE COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cachimayo, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.


La socia es la Sra. Marleni; tiene 30 años de edad, y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ganado (vacas), ella los vende en diferentes lugares como Urubamba, Calca y Anta, la socia quiere ampliar y tener un lugar para vender el ganado. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar 1 ganado.


 La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank “SR DE COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO”.  The bank is located in the Cachimayo district, in the Anta province, state of Cusco.

Sra. Marleni is 30 years old, lives with her partner, and has 2 children.  She varies her daily activities according to her business buying and selling cattle (cows).  She sells them in various places such as Urubamba, Calca, and Anta. She wants to expand her business and have a place to sell the cattle.  Se is requesting a loan to purchase a cow.  

She is thankful for the loan and promises to make her payments in the established time frame.

loans.use: To puchase a cow.

loans.name: Portales Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama Portales. Está ubicado en la comunidad de Santana Portales en el Estado de Tlaxcala.  El grupo está conformado por 11 integrantes. 

Sra. Patricia C.C es una integrante de este grupo. Tiene 30 años, estudió hasta el 3ro de secundaria. Es casada y tiene en 2 hijos, 1niña y 1 varones.  Ella se dedica a elaborar chamarras  que inició hace 3 años. Solicita el préstamo para compra telas. Sus clientes son el público en general.  Al momento de solicitar este préstamo se siente entusiasmada ya que obtiene un crédito que para ella es importante para esta epoca. Quiere este crédito para compra tela ya que si compra por mayoreo le sale más barato. También espera que con este préstamo y su esfuerzo poder tener unas mejor calidad de vida para ella y su familia.

Nadia R.L es la presidente del grupo; Tiene 26 años, estudió hasta 3ro de secundaria  es propietaria de una estética, tiene un hijo varón.  Su  estética la  inició hace 3 años. Solicita el préstamo para comprar tintes; peróxidos y tijeras .Sus clientes son el  público en general.  Al momento de solicitar este préstamo se sintió entusiasmada por tener nuevamente la oportunidad de que le dieran su crédito con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Con este  préstamo desea obtener más clientes y así poder tener una mejor calidad de vida tanto ella como su hijo.
texts.en:
This group is called "Portales." It is located in the Santana Portales area in the state of Tlaxcala. The group is formed by 11 members.

Patricia C.C is a member of this group. She is 30 years old, studied through her third year of secondary school. She is married and has two children, a boy and a girl. She makes jackets and has been doing so for three years. She seeks this loan to buy fabric. Her clients are the general public. Upon seeking this loan, she felt excited because the loan is very important to her at this stage. She wants to buy fabric at wholesale because she can get it cheaper. Also, she hopes that with this loan, she can achieve a better quality of life for her and her family.

Nadia R.L is the president of the group. She is 26 years old, studied through the third year of secondary school, and is the owner of a beauty salon, and has one son. She has had her salon for three years. She seeks this loan to purchase dyes, bleaches, and scissors. Her clients are the general public. When she sought the loan, she felt excited to have new opportunity that the loan gave her. With this loan, she hopes to obtain more clients and therefore have a better quality of life for her and her son.

loans.use: To invest in their business

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SR D. COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cachimayo, perteneciente a la provincia D. Anta y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Bernardina; tiene 53 años D. edad, y es casada y tiene 6 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. compra y venta D. conejos, la socia venD. en forma ambulatoria en las diferentes ferias que se dan en el distrito D. Anta, la socia quiere tener un lugar más granD. para vender los conejos. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar conejos

 La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Bernardina belongs to the “SR D. COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO” Communal Bank.  The bank is locted in the Cachimayo district, which belongs to the Anta province, Cusco department.

Bernardina, age 53, is married and has six children.  She alternates her daily activities with the business of buying and selling rabbits.  She sells in an itinerant manner at the different fairs in the Anta district.  She wants to have a larger place to sell the rabbits.

She is requesting the loan to buy rabbits.

She is grateful for the requested loan, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: To buy rabbits

loans.name: Iris

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “LOS DIAMANTES”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Iris; La socia tiene 31 años de edad, ella es soltera, la socia trabaja como docente, ella es profesora en un jardín de niños, la socia está terminando de estudiar la carrera profesional de contabilidad, ella desea el crédito para pagar una mensualidad, la socia desea terminar sus estudios para obtener un mejor trabajo y del mismo modo una mejor y mayor remuneración. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en sus estudios.

 La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Iris belongs to the “LOS DIAMANTES” (The Diamonds) Communal Bank.  The communal bank is located in the Huanchac district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Iris is 31 years old and single.  She works as a teacher, and she teaches kindergarten.  She is finishing her professional studies for an accounting career.

She wants the loan to make a monthly payment.  She wishes to finish her education in order to get a better job.  This way she will get better and greater compensation.  She is requesting the loan for her education.

She appreciates and values the loan that has been provided. Therefore, she promises to complete her payments by the established deadlines.

loans.use: For her education

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es: Gloria tiene 66 años, es madre D. 4 hijos; que ya son mayores D. edad y vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo. DesD. hace 20 años, se dedica a la venta D. tamales, en la puerta D. su casa,  mediante este negocio se hizo muy conocida en su barrio, y es por ello que emprendió en la venta D. cosméticos a sus clientes exclusivos y desD. entonces le va muy bien, ya que no tiene problemas D. pago. Lo que más le gusta D. su negocio, es que conversa mucho con sus clientes y D. paso aprovecha, en aconsejarles las propiedades D. sus productos. Es así que su negocio le ha resultado rentable, han transcurrido 2 años realizando esta actividad y espera comprarse una vitrina, para poder exhibir sus productos. Es su segundo crédito con MFP, y se compromete en pagar puntualmente cada una D. sus cuotas. En su grupo se lleva con todas las integrantes por lo solidarios que son. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará más productos D. belleza, para diversificar y aumentar la cantidad D. productos que tiene.
texts.en:
Gloria is 66 years old, and she has four grown children.  She lives in her own house with her husband.  She has been selling tamales in the doorway to her house for 20 years.  She has become very well-known in her neighborhood because of her business.  That is why she undertook selling cosmetics to her customers.  It has gone very well for her, and she does not have payment problems.

What she likes most about her business is talking a lot with her customers.  She casually takes advantage of talking with them to advise them about the particulars of her products.  That is how her business turned out to be profitable.  She has been doing this for two years.  She hopes to buy a display case to be able to display her products.

This is her second loan with MFP.  She pledges to make each of her payments punctually.  She gets along well with all of the group members because they are so supportive.  She will use the requested loan to buy more beauty products, to diversify, and to increase the quantity of products that she has.

loans.use: To stock up on cosmetics

loans.name: Zenobio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LOS LIDERES”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.


El socio es el Sr. Zenobio; el tiene 24 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de cuyes y gallinas, el cría en su casa los hace crecer y engordar y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias que existe en la provincia de Anta, el socia quiere mejorar el negocio de compra y venta de animales. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar cuyes y gallinas.


El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Zenobio belongs to the “Los Lideres” [The Leaders] communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, province of Cusco, and department of Cusco. Zenobio is 24 years old, lives with a partner, and has one child. 

Zenobio’s business is the buying and selling of hens and guinea pigs. He raises the animals in his home. After they have grown and fattened up, he then sells them at various markets in the province of Anta.

Zenobio wants this loan to buy more animals to improve his business. He is grateful to all who have made this possible, and promises to make his payments according to the schedule.

loans.use: Buy hens and guinea pigs.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SR DE COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cachimayo, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Luz Marina; tiene 22 años de edad, y es casada y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de cerveza, ella tiene un deposito de cerveza y atiende desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m y por medio de este negocio saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cajas de cerveza al por mayor.

 La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Luz Marina is a member of the communal bank "SR OF COYLLORITTY Cachimayo". The bank is located in the district of Cachimayo, which is in the province of Anta and the department of Cusco.

Ms. Luz Marina is 22 years old and is married with 1 son. She alternates her daily activities with her business selling beer.  She has a beer depot which is open from 9:00 am to 10:00 pm.  Her business is allowing her to give her child a head start in life, so the member wants to expand the business. The member is requesting a loan to buy cases of beer at wholesale.

The member is grateful for the requested loan and agrees to make her payments on time.

loans.use: The member is requesting the loan to buy cases of beer at wholesale.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es: Hilda tiene 60 años, es madre soltera, vive en casa alquilada en compañía de su hijo. Todos los días muy temprano por la mañana; después de una hora en carro, acude al cafetín del instituto de energía Nuclear, donde Hilda, se dedica al negocio de venta de café, sándwich, queques,  galletas y gaseosas. Sus clientes gustan de su trato amable y la buena atención que les brinda, es por eso que siempre esta lleno de compradores. En  su negocio se siente muy contenta, por las rentas que le genera su negocio, permitiéndole pagar a su ayudante, quien le es muy útil en su negocio. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo, es que se relaciona con mucha gente, con los que conversa mucho y se mantiene muy ocupada. En adelante, quiere comprarse una vitrina, donde pueda exhibir sus postres. Es su 11avo crédito con MFP, y ya sabe que tiene que pagar puntualmente sus cuotas y esta dispuesta hacerlo. En su banco comunal es un a socia muy alegre y responsable. Con el crédito que solicita, comprará diversidad de golosinas y gaseosas para implementar su cafetín.
texts.en:
Hilda is 60 years old.  She is a single mother and lives in a rental house with her son.  Every day, very early in the morning, after one hour in the car, she arrives at the café at the Instituto de Engergia Nuclear (Institute for Nuclear Energy) where she works selling coffee, sandwiches, cakes, cookies and soda.  Her customers like her friendly service and so her café is always full.  She feels very happy with her business because of the money it makes which allows her to pay an assistant.  Her assistant is very helpful in the business.  What she most likes about the work is that she gets to interact with a lot of people.  She chats a lot to her customers and is kept very busy.  In the future, she would like to buy a display case where she can display her desserts.

This is Hilda's 11th loan from MFP and she knows that she has to make her repayments punctually.  She is ready to do this.  She is a very happy and responsible member of her community bank.  She will use this loan to buy a variety of candies and soda to keep her café going.

loans.use: To buy a variety of candies and soda to keep her business going

loans.name: Alpha

texts.en:
This is 36 year old Alpha K..  He is married and has 4 children ages 3, 5, 8 and 12 years old. In 1995, Alpha K. established his building materials business, selling paints, brushes, nails, cohesive liquids (glues), etc.  He began his business because he believes business can make self reliance. Working 7 days a week and 8 hours a day, he earns about 1,300,000 SLL every month from this business.

He needs a loan in the amount of 3,000,000 SLL.  Alpha K. has already received and successfully repaid one loan and now requires a new loan in order to buy more of his stock. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately 380,000 SLL. In the future, Alpha K. plans to educate his children and build a house.

He is a serious and determined business man, and he thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more building materials

loans.name: Lucero Ixt Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama LUCERO IXT Está ubicado en el Estado de Puebla México.  El grupo está conformado por  11 integrantes. 

Leticia G. A. es la presidenta del grupo. Tiene 41 años, estudió hasta la secundaria, es comerciante y tiene tres hijos: dos varones de 18 y 7 años de edad, una niña de 9 años. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa que inicio hace 5 años. Solicita el préstamo para comprar mercancía en especial ropa de temporada invernal. Conversamos con algunos de sus clientes quienes comentaron están satisfechos con la ropa que les vende ya que es de buena calidad y  les vende sobre pedido lo que ellos buscan además de que les da facilidades de pago y a domicilio.  Al momento de solicitar este préstamo se siente muy contenta ya que  haciendo su inversión logrará cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes. Quiere este crédito para poder comprar ropa de invierno y más adelante poner un negocio establecido en la comunidad y vender ropa para toda ocasión. Con sus ganancias espera brindarles mejor educación y una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
This group is called "LUCERO IXT." It is located in the Puebla México state and is formed of 11 members.

Leticia G. A. is the president of the group. She is 41 years old, studied through secondary school, and is a businesswoman with three children: two boys who are 18 and 7 years old, and one daughter who is 9. She sells clothes and has done so for 9 years. She seeks this loan to purchase merchandise, especially clothes for the winter season. We spoke with some of her clients who expressed their satisfaction with her clothing, which is very high quality, and she sells what they're looking for as well as payment services and delivery.

She is very happy to seek this loan as the investment in her business will help her fulfill her clients orders. She seeks this loan to purchase winter clothing and later to put in an established business in her community and sell clothing for all occasions. With her earnings, she hopes to bring a better education and quality of life to her children.

loans.use: To purchase merchandise for winter

loans.name: Ambrocio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LOS LIDERES”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Ambrocio; el tiene 50 años de edad y es casado y tiene 5 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de verduras, el tiene un pequeño terreno donde siembra maíz, papa y verduras y luego los vende en diferentes ferias de la provincia de Anta, el socio quiere mejorar las tierras de cultivo. 

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Ambrocio belongs to “Los Líderes” (The Leaders) community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Ambrocio is 50 years old.  He is married and has 5 children.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his business buying and selling vegetables.  He has a small plot of land where he grows corn, potatoes and vegetables which he then sells in different markets in Anta province.  He would like to improve the plot of land where he grows his crops.

He is grateful to those who will take part in his dream by funding his loan and pledges to make his repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy seeds and fertilizer for the plot where he grows his crops

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal  “LOS DIAMANTES”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana; La socia tiene 65 años de edad, ella es casada, y tiene 8 hijos, la socia tiene una tienda abarrotes desde hace 8 años; la socia atiende su tienda y ella suele levantarse a las 5 de la mañana a esperar que le traigan el pan fresco y limpiar su tienda hacer su desayuno, luego ella para esto ya tiene abierta su tiendita y coloca todo en su lugar y comienza su jornada semanal, ella descansa los domingos y cierra su tienda  a las 10 de la noche. La socia requiere comprar champan, vinos, galletas, pasas y todo lo que suele salir en la época navideña, también comprará panetones. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de sus productos navideños.

 La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “LOS DIAMANTES” community bank. The community bank is located in the the Huanchac district, located in the Cusco province and Cusco department.

The member’s name is Juana. She is 65 years old. She is married and she has 8 children. Juana has had a grocery store for 8 years. She looks after her store and usually wakes up at 5 in the morning to wait for the fresh bread and clean up around the store. She makes her breakfast, opens the store, makes sure everything is in order and starts her day. She closes the store at 10 pm and on Sundays, she rests.The member wants to buy champagne, wine, cookies, raisins and other products for Christmas. She will also buy Panettones. She is requesting the loan to invest in her Christmas product purchases.

She appreciates and values the loan and she promises to repay the loan in a timely manner.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of Christmas items

loans.name: Mery Estela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SR D. COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cachimayo, perteneciente a la provincia D. Anta y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Mery Estela; tiene 42 años D. edad, y es casada y tiene 2 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. comida, ella venD. en el distrito D. Izcuchaca, ella venD. desD. las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia quiere mejorar y ampliar el negocio D. venta D. comida. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como carne, pollo y verduras.

 La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Mery Estela is a member of the “SR D. COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO” community bank which is located in Cachimayo district, in Anta province, in Cusco department.

Mery Estela is 42 years old.  She is married and has 2 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling food.  She sells in Izcuchaca district from 9.00am to 6.00pm.  She would like to improve and expand her food business.  She is requesting this loan to buy cooking products such as meat, chicken and vegetables.

She is grateful for the loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy cooking products such as meat, chicken and vegetables

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SR DE COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cachimayo, perteneciente a la provincia de Anta y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Vilma; tiene 50 años de edad, y es conviviente y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de animales menores como cuyes, gallinas y chanchos y también tiene una tienda de abarrotes, la socia atiende desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar la tienda de abarrotes. La  socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos como arroz, azúcar, leche y galletas para la tienda de abarrotes.

 La socia agradece el préstamo solicitado  y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Vilma is a member of the “SR DE COYLLORITTY CACHIMAYO” community bank which is located in Cachimayo district, in Anta province, in Cusco department.

Vilma is 50 years old.  She lives with her partner and has 5 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling young animals such as guinea pigs, chickens and pigs.  She also has a grocery store where she serves from 5.00am to 7.00pm.  She would like to expand her grocery store.  She is requesting this loan to buy products such as rice, sugar, milk and cookies for her grocery store.

She is grateful for the loan and pledges to make her repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy products such as rice, sugar, milk and cookies for her grocery store

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal  “LOS DIAMANTES”;  El banco comunal está ubicado en el distrito de Huanchac perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Julio; El socio tiene  45 años de edad, el es conviviente, y tiene 3 hijos, el socio trabaja como personal de seguridad desde el año 2003, el socio a su vez está invirtiendo en la artesanía junto a su conyugue, el está trabajando paralelamente de manera independiente con la artesanía, el socio compra y vende artesanía, el ahora desea el crédito para invertir en la compra de mercadería para la temporada de navidad. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la copra de mercadería de tipo artesanal.

La socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado mediante este medio y del mismo modo se compromete en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Julio is a member of the “Los Diamantes” (Diamonds) community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province, in Cusco department.

Julio is 45 years old.  He lives with his partner and has 3 children.  He has worked as a security guard since 2003.  He is also investing in a handicrafts business together with his spouse.  In parallel with his main job, he is also working independently in the handicraft business.  He buys and sells handicrafts.  Julio would like this loan to invest in buying merchandise for the Christmas season.  He is requesting the loan to invest in buying handicrafts.

He is grateful for the loan and appreciates it.  He also pledges to make his repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To invest in buying handicrafts

loans.name: Raymundo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “LOS LIDERES”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Raymundo; el tiene 62 años de edad y es casado y tiene 3 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de loseria, el vende ollas, platos y tazas del material de loza en un atienda que tiene en la provincia de Izcuchaca,el socio atiende desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,el socio quiere ampliar el negocio. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar utensilios de loza al por mayor.

El socio agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
Raymundo is a member of “Los Líderes” (The Leaders) community bank which is located in Cusco district, in the province and department of the same name.

Raymundo is 62 years old.  He is married and has 3 children.  He divides his time between his daily activities and his business selling earthenware products.  He sells earthenware pans, plates and cups in a store which he has in Izcuchaca province.  He serves in his store from 9.00am to 7.00pm and would like to expand his business.  He is requesting this loan to buy earthenware utensils wholesale.

He is grateful to those who will take part in his dream by funding his loan and pledges to make his repayments in a timely manner.

loans.use: To buy earthenware utensils wholesale

loans.name: Jaime

texts.es:
Jaime es una persona muy joven él vive solo en la  comunidad de tipa monte  provincia Mizque del departamento  de Cochabamba, Jaime  con  30 años de edad   desde muy pequeño por la pobreza y  abandono de sus padres empezó a trabajar en la agricultura con sus vecinos en el  lugar donde vive  ahí fue aprendiendo a cultivar papa  zanahoria y frejol  en el tiempo que creció.

En el lugar donde vive solo cosechan dos  veces al año con el esfuerzo de su trabajo y con el  crédito que está solicitando el desea invertir más en sus cultivos comprando mas abono orgánico y semillas para recuperar algo de lo perdido de su anterior  cosecha y de esa manera mejorar su  calidad de vida
texts.en:
Jaime is a very young person.  He lives alone in the community of Tipa Monte, in Mizque province, in Cochabamba department.  Jaime is 30 years old.  From a very early age, because of poverty and the abandonment of his parents, he started to work in farming with the neighbors in his community.  He learned how to grow potatoes, carrots and beans while he was growing up.

Where Jaime lives, they only harvest twice a year.  With his hard work and the loan he is requesting, he would like to invest more in his crops, buying more organic fertilizer and seeds to recover something of what he lost in his last harvest and thereby improve his quality of life.

loans.use: To buy organic fertilizer for his crops

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan tiene 26 años, es un joven muy trabajador y responsable, vive en casa de unos parientes. Juan es mecánico, que por su buen trabajo es muy reconocido por la zona donde vive. Es especialista en reparar el motor de los carros petroleros, que junto a un amigo trabajan en un taller. Durante estos años de mucho esfuerzo y dedicación, han logrado ganarse el reconocimientos de los chóferes, que ahora lo buscan y le esperan a pesar de lo muy  ocupado que esta. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo, es que  tiene  clientes que le prefieren y reconocen su trabajo, por lo que se siente motivado para continuar trabajando. Con el tiempo desea tener su propio taller, para trabajar de manera independiente. Este es su primer crédito con MFP, y sabe que este aporte le será muy beneficioso para aumentar su capital de trabajo, por ello se compromete a pagar todas las cuotas oportunamente. Con este crédito que solicita, se comprará una comprensora de aire para pintar y un aspersor de sistema de planchados, para que su trabajos sea más eficiente.
texts.en:
Juan is 26 years old.  He is a very hard-working and responsible young man.  He lives in a house with some relatives.  Juan is a mechanic and, because of the good work he does, he is well known in his district.  He is a specialist in fixing car engines.  He works in a workshop together with a friend.  Through years of hard work and dedication, he has managed to earn the recognition of drivers who now come to him and wait for his services no matter how busy he is.  What he most likes about his work is that he has customers who prefer his service and acknowledge his work.  This makes him feel motivated to keep working.  Over time, he would like to have his own workshop so that he can work independently.

This is Juan's first loan with MFP and he knows that this support will be very beneficial to him in increasing his working capital.  For this reason, he pledges to make his repayments in a timely manner.  He will use his loan to buy an air compressor for painting and a sprayer so that his work is more efficient.

loans.use: To buy an air compressor and sprayer

loans.name: Ya Yeabu

texts.en:
This is 26 year old Ya Yeabu K..  She is married and has no children.  She has 3 additional dependents who live with her because they are her relatives, and they help her with her business.

In 2005, Ya Yeabu K. established her business selling plastic bowls and sets of pans. She began her business because she wanted to be self-employed and to help with the upkeep of her family.  Working 6 days a week and 7 hours a day, she earns about 1,400,000 SLL every month from this business. She needs a loan of 4,000,000 SLL.

Ya Yeabu K. has already received and successfully repaid one loan and now requires a new loan in order to expand her business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately 600,000 SLL.

In the future, Ya Yeabu K. plans to help her husband and build a house. She is very helpful and wants to be a wholesaler to other traders.  She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more plastic bowls and sets of pans

loans.name: Estrellas De Loma Alta Group

texts.es:
El grupo decidió poner el nombre de Estrellas de Loma Alta ya que la localidad en la que radican lleva el nombre: loma alta, y las integrantes se consideran unas estrellas ya que gracias al crédito esperan brillar en su comunidad; esto con los negocios que están apresurando o inyectando ingresos.
      Su meta es ser un ejemplo de mujeres exitosas, para incitar a otras mujeres de la localidad a que inicien sus propios negocios y loma alta sea una comunidad llena de familias en progreso.

Sandra alcántara es la tesorera del grupo, en su domicilio tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes y recaudería; el crédito que solicito en esta ocasión lo utilizara para invertir en la recaudería ya que en la localidad hay muy pocas personas que venden recaudo. Ampliando la variedad en su recaudería incrementará sus ingresos y será de gran ayuda para ampliar la tienda y recaudería, esperando ser la mejor tienda  y recaudería de la comunidad.

   Brenda Ivonne M.  es la presidenta, ella invierte en un pequeño negocio de ropa, el cual espera convertirlo en toda una boutique. Por el momento ella sale a vender en las casas de familiares, amigos y conocidos, tiene pensado rentar un local el cual acondicionara para mostrar la variedad de ropa que vende y esto le ayude a incrementar sus ventas y con ello su familia contara con un ingreso mayor que les ayudara para pagar el colegio de sus hijos. Observación: Aparece una niña en la foto.
texts.en:
This group chose to be called Estrellas de Loma Alta (Stars of Loma Alta) because this is the name of the place where they live, and because its members consider themselves like stars, since thanks to the loan they hope to shine in their community, either through the activities they are engaging in or by injecting earnings.

Their goal is to be an example of successful women, in order to encourage other women of their area to start their own activities, so that Loma Alta can become a community bursting with succeeding families.

Sandra Alcántara is the treasurer of the group. She runs a small grocery store and a fruit and vegetable stand; the loan she is requesting in this occasion will be invested in greengroceries, as in the locality there are very few people that sell this product. By widening the variety of her greengrocer’s stand she will increase her earnings and this will be of great help to expand the shop and fruit and vegetable, as she hopes for her shop and stand to be the best of the community.

Brenda Ivonne M. is the president. She runs a small clothes shop that she hopes to transform in a real boutique. For the moment she sells clothes going to her relatives, friends and acquaintances’ houses. She is thinking about renting a room and to arrange it to show the variety of clothes that she sell, hoping that this will help increasing her sales, thus providing a better income for her family that will help her sorting school expenses for her children.

<cite>Note: there is a young girl in the picture.</cite>

loans.use: To increse their working capital

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Marie

texts.en:
This is 35 year old Marie B..  She is married and has 3 children ages 4, 7, and 9 years. In 1990, Marie B. established her plastic footwear business. She began her business because she believed it could be a means of generating income to sustain her family.

Working 7 days a week and 8 hours a day, she earns about 1,450,000 SLL every month from this business. She needs a loan of 3,000,000 SLL in order to expand her business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately 500,000 SLL.

In the future, Marie B. plans to open a bigger shop and support her children to the university level. She is very serious and determined for the success of the business.  She sells in wholesale to other traders.

She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more shoes

loans.name: Maryuri Yessenia

texts.es:
Maryuri tiene 18 años de edad, estudia II año de Ingenieria Agropecuaria, la Universidad le otorgó media beca y el resto sus padres la ayudan a pagar, su Mamá es Enfermera y su Papá es Agricultor. Le encantan los Cultivos y la crianza de animales domesticos. Su familia tenia un negocio de Crianza, engorde y venta Avicola.

Ella realizó este préstamo para invertir en compra de Insumos, para un Proyecto de la Universidad para Cultivar Repollo.

Su meta es adquirir conocimientos y tecnicas basicas de su carrera, coronar su carrera, conseguir un trabajo en una empresa y proximamente tener su propio negocio.
texts.en:
Maryuri is 18 years old.  She is in her second year of higher education in agricultural engineering.  The university gave her a grant for half of the cost, and her parents help her pay for the rest.  Her mother is a nurse, and her father is a farmer.  She really likes growing crops and raising domestic animals.  Her family has a business of raising, fattening, and selling poultry.

She used this loan to buy supplies for a university project of cultivating cabbage.

Her goal is to get the knowledge and basic techniques for her career, to set up her career, and to find work with a company.  Next, her goal is to have her own business.

loans.use: For a student agricultural project of growing cabbage

loans.name: Milvia Azucena

texts.es:
Milvia tiene 20 años, vive en Condega, estudia II año de Ingenieria Agropecuaria, ella decicidio estudiar esta carrera, porque su Mamá se dedican a esto. Su Mama la ayuda a pagar la universidad, una parte la paga UCATSE con una Beca.

Ella realizó este préstamo para invertir en compra de Insumos, para un Proyecto de la Universidad para Cultivar Repollo.

Desea finalizar su carrera, buscar un trabajo y mas adelante formar su propia empresa.
texts.en:
Milvia is 20 years old, and she lives in Condega.  She is in her second year of higher education in agricultural engineering.  She decided to study this career because her mother has this career.  Her mother helps her pay for the university.  UCATSE (Catholic Agricultural University of Trópico Seco) pays for part of her education with a grant.

She used this loan to buy supplies for a university project of cultivating cabbage.

She wishes to finish her career studies, look for work, and later form her own company.

loans.use: For a student agricultural project of growing cabbage

loans.name: Orlando Josseel

texts.es:
Orlando tiene 18 años de edad, estudia II año de Ingenieria Agropecuaria, vive en Condega, sus padres le ayudan a pagar los estudios, ayuda a sus padres con la venta de productos lacteos. Siempre le ha gustado todas las actividades agropecuarias.

El realizó este préstamo para invertir en compra de Insumos, para un Proyecto de la Universidad para Cultivar Repollo.

Este credito es importante, porque ayuda a impulsar la siembra de este tipo de productos y sobre todo adquirir experiencia en la carrera. Su meta es tener buenos resultados en los estudios, culminar su carrera y encontrar un trabajo.
texts.en:
Orlando is 18 years old.  He is in his second year of higher education in agricultural engineering.  He lives in Condega.  His parents help him pay for his education, and he helps his parents with the sale of dairy products.  He has always liked farming activities.

He used the loan for supplies for a university project of cultivating cabbage.

This loan is important because it helps drive the planting of these types of products.  Above all, it helps to get career experience.  His goal is to have good results in his studies, finish his education, and to find work.

loans.use: For a student agricultural project of growing cabbage

loans.name: Adela Aida

texts.es:
La Señora Adela se dedica a la produccion de leche cruda, cuenta con 6 cabezas de gando lechero, ubicado en la zona de la la Maica, zona periferica de la Ciudad de Cochabamba donde cuida de su ganado. 

La Señora se encuentra casada, tiene 5 hijos pequeños, a quienes cuida y mantiene, con la produccion de la leche cruda. Ambos esposos se levantan todos los dias para la jornada diaria de cortar el pasto para el alimento de las vacas, y a las 6 de la mañana se dedican a ordeñar las vacas para empezar a recoelctar la leche que la comercializaran en el mercado popular. luego llegan casi a medio dia para dar nuevamente alimento a sus vacas y a las 6 de la tarde debe nuevamente porceder al ordeñar a las vacas.

Todos los dias realizan esta actividad, ellos ya estan acostumbrados a trabajar mucho porque desena que sus hijos que aun son pequeños puedan tener una mejor vida, terminen sus estudios y sean profesionales.

La señora Adela solicito un credito para la compra de forraje(soya) para su ganado pues desea aprovechar la opurtunida de poder comprar en gran cantidad la soya que le dure por lo menos unos meses, para no estar comprando casi cada dia.
texts.en:
Adela works producing raw milk.  She has 6 heads of dairy cattle.  She lives in La Maica district, an outlying district of the city of Cochabamba, where she tends to her cattle.

Adela is married and has 5 young children who she looks after and supports through her raw milk business.  Both herself and her husband get up every day for their day's work cutting fodder to feed their cows.  At 6 o'clock in the morning they milk their cows so that they can begin to collect the milk which they will sell in the market.  At around midday they feed their cows again and at 6 in the evening they must milk them again.

Every day they do this work.  They are used to working hard by now because they want their children, although they are still young, to have a better life, to finish their studies and to become professionals.

Adela is requesting a loan to buy fodder (soya) for her cattle since she would like to take advantage of the opportunity to be able to buy the soya in large quantities so that it will last her for at least a few months, rather than having to keep buying it nearly every day.

loans.use: To buy fodder to feed her dairy herd

loans.name: Ramon Atahualpa

texts.es:
Ramon tiene 18 años de edad, estudia II año de Ingenieria Agroopecuaria, vive en Esteli, eligio esa carrera porque siempre le gusto trabajar en las actividades agropecuarias y ganaderas. Trabaja y estudia y recibe ayuda de sus padres. Trabaja en su negocio de Carpinteria en el tiempo libre.

El realizó este préstamo para invertir en compra de Insumos, para un Proyecto de la Universidad para Cultivar Repollo.

Su meta es terminar la carrera, y en un futuro crear su propio negocio.
texts.en:
Ramon is 18 years old.  He is in his second year of higher education in agricultural engineering.  He lives in Esteli.  He chose this career because he has always liked doing farming and livestock work.  He works, studies, and gets help from his parents.  He works in his carpentry business in his free time.

He used the loan for supplies for a university project of cultivating cabbage.

His goal is to finish his career education and create his own business in the future.

loans.use: For a student agricultural project of growing cabbage

loans.name: Rommell Amed

texts.es:
Rommell tiene 18 años de edad, estudia en II año de Ingenieria Agropecuaria, decidio estudiar esta carrera porque sus padres se dedican a este tipo de actividad y es en el ambiente que el se crio. Ayuda a su Mamá, en una Pulperia. Tambien tienen una distribuidora de Gas Butano.

El realizó este préstamo para invertir en compra de Insumos, para un Proyecto de la Universidad para Cultivar Repollo.

Agradece a KIVA por la oportunidad que le brindo para llevar a cabo este proyecto con sus compañeros de la Universidad. Desea terminar sus estudios, ser independiente y crear su propio Capital.
texts.en:
Rommell, 18, is a second year Agriculture and Cattle Raising student.  He decided on this career choice because his parents are in this occupation and it's the environment he grew up in.  He helps his mother in a grocery store and they also have a butane gas distribution business.

He negotiated this loan to buy supplies for a university project: to grow cabbage.

He thanks KIVA for the opportunity it gave him to complete this project with his companions at the university.  He wants to finish his studies, become independent and create his own capital.

loans.use: Agronomy Student Project: Vegetable (Cabbage) Farming.

loans.name: Maria Jose

texts.es:
Maria Jose tiene 18 años, estudia II año de Ingenieria Agropecuaria, vive en Jalapa, decidio estudiar esta carrera porque le gusta mucho el campo, y siente que ella puede poner su propio negocio. Su Mama es Maestra y su Papá es Conductor, sus padres y un tio le ayudan a pagar sus gastos, la Universidad le dio una beca para su carrera.

Ella realizó este préstamo para invertir en compra de Insumos, para un Proyecto de la Universidad para Cultivar Repollo.

Su meta es seguir estudiando para terminar su carrera, y crear su propio negocio.
texts.en:
María José, 18, is a second year Agronomy and Cattle Raising student.  She lives in Jalapa.  She decided on this career choice because she enjoys the countryside and feels she can establish her own business.

Her mother is a teacher and her father is a driver.  Her parents and an uncle help her pay her expenses.  She also got a scholarship from the university for her career.

She negotiated this loan to buy supplies for the university project:  to grow cabbage.

Her goal is to continue studying to finish her career and create her own business.

loans.use: Agronomy Student Project: Vegetable (Cabbage) Farming.

loans.name: David Juan

texts.es:
David tiene 36 años de edad, es soltero y reside en el caserío Chacupe, una zona rural que tiene como actividad principal a la agricultura y que se encuentra ubicada en el distrito de La Victoria, a veinte minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Se dedica a trabajar en labores asociadas a la agricultura desde hace mas de quince años, el suele sembrar granos y forraje en un pequeño terreno de cultivo con el que cuenta, adicionalmente ayuda a su madre a conducir el manejo de unos terrenos agrícolas de su propiedad, además posee algunas cabezas de ganado de las cuales aprovecha la leche que producen.

David desea adquirir fertilizantes y pesticidas para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo de maíz, con esta acción el espera obtener una buena cosecha. Por ello se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.

David es una persona bastante tranquila y responsable. Su mayor anhelo es poder crecer como empresario y salir adelante.
texts.en:
David is 36 years old.  He is single and lives in the village of Chacupe.  It is a rural area whose main business activity is farming and which is located in La Victoria district, twenty minutes from the city of Chiclayo.

David has been working in farming for more than fifteen years.  He normally grows grains and fodder on a small plot of land which he owns.  He also helps his mother to manage some plots of farming land on her property.  He owns some heads of cattle and takes advantage of the milk which they produce.

David would like to acquire some fertilizers and pesticides to maintain his corn crop.  This way, he hopes to obtain a good harvest.  For this reason, he needs to request a loan for 2,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

David is quite a calm and responsible person.  His biggest wish is to be able to grow as a businessman and to get ahead.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and pesticides to maintain his crop

loans.name: Dora

texts.es:
La señora Dora vive por la Zona de Viloma Grande, a 25 Km de la ciudad de Cochabamba, ella se dedica a la produccion de leche cruda y a la agricultura, con el cultivo de cebolla, zanahoria y maiz. Tiene 3 hijos pequeños. de 12, 7 y 5 años. Su concubino la abandono hace tres años. Desde entonces viven solos en su casa y ell a siempre a buscado la forma de  sustentar su hogar por eso tiene multiples actividades como la agricultura, la alecheria y ademas ayuda en un vive con el cuida de plantas. 

Ahora ella desea aumentar su ganado para poder tener mejores ingresos mensuales pues la agricultura solo le ayuda de forma temporal cada 6 meses o cuando es epoca de cosecha, y ella necesita mas ingresos mensuales pues sus pequeños hijos requieren de mas necesidades. Por esa razon solicito un credito para poder compranse una vaca mas.
texts.en:
Dora lives in the Viloma Grande area, 25km from the city of Cochabamba. She works in raw-milk production and agriculture, cultivating onions, carrots and corn. She has three small children, who are 12, 7 and 5 years old. Her partner left her three years ago. Since then, they have lived alone in their home. She has always looked for a way to support her household, which is why she undertakes multiple economic activities, such as agriculture, dairy farming and also helping in a nursery taking care of the plants.

Now she wants to increase the number of her cattle in order to have greater monthly income, since agriculture only helps her on a seasonal basis every six months or when it is harvest time. She needs more monthly income to support her children. For this reason, she sought a loan in order to buy herself one more cow.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Diego Milan

texts.es:
Diego tiene 21 años de edad, estudia II año de Ingeniería Agropecuaria, vive en Chinandega; su Mamá es Ama de Casa  su Papá se dedica a la agricultura y la Ganadería, y esto lo motivo a estudiar esta Carrera, viaja desde Chinandega a Estelí cada 15 días. A los 7 años comenzó a trabajar con su Papa. Su Papa y un hermano que vive en Estados Unidos le ayudan a pagar la universidad. Se dedica a la compra-venta de Ganado. 
El realizó este préstamo para invertir en compra de Insumos, para un Proyecto de la Universidad para Cultivar Repollo.
Su Objetivo es Coronar su carrera y trabajar por su propia cuenta en Agricultura y Ganadería, y le gustaría adquirir un nuevo crédito para comenzar su propio negocio.
texts.en:
Diego, 21, is a second year Agronomy and Cattle Raising student.  He lives in Chinandega.  His mother is a housewife and his father is a farmer and cattleman; this is what motivated to study this particular career.  He travels from Chinandega to Estelí every two weeks.  He started working with his father when he was 7 years old.  His father who is a cattle merchant and a brother who lives in the United States help him pay his university costs.  

He negotiated this loan to buy supplies for a university project: to grow cabbage.

His goal is to complete his studies and to work for himself in this field.  He’d like to get another loan to start his own business.

loans.use: Agronomy Student Project:  Vegetable (Cabbage) Farming.

loans.name: Nilda Doris

texts.es:
Nilda tiene 61 años de edad, es separada y reside en una zona urbano marginal de la ciudad de Chiclayo, una de las ciudades mas comerciales del norte peruano.

Se dedica desde hace mas de cinco años a la elaboración y venta de postres y yogurt, ella prepara estos productos de modo casero y luego los ofrece en venta al público en general, a veces trabaja en base a pedidos y también distribuye su mercadería en las tiendas de la zona. Debido al tiempo que lleva trabajando en esta actividad y a la buena calidad con la que prepara sus productos actualmente cuenta con una clientela fidelizada.

Nilda desea adquirir insumos para seguir adelante con su negocio, ella espera abrirse mercado vendiendo su producto en más bodegas de la zona, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Ella es una mujer que gusta de sentirse activa, por ello siempre da lo mejor de si en las actividades que realiza. Las personas que le conocen le consideran una mujer responsable y de confianza.
texts.en:
Nilda is 61 years old. She is separated and lives in a marginal urban zone of the city of Chiclayo, one of the most commercial cities in northern Peru. 

For more than five years, she has worked preparing and selling desserts and yogurt. She prepares these products at home, and later she offers them for sale to the general public. Sometimes she works in response to orders, and she also distributes her products to the stores in her area. Thanks to the time she has dedicated to this work and the excellent quality with which she prepares her products, she currently has a loyal customer base. 

Nilda would like to purchase supplies so that she can continue her business. She hopes to gain more market share and sell her products in more shops in the area. For this reason, she has decided to request a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1000 Peruvian new soles, which will help her achieve her objective.

She is a woman who likes to feel active, and because of this, she always puts the best of herself into the activities she carries out. People who know her consider her a responsible and trustworthy woman.

loans.use: Buying supplies to expand her business preparing and selling cakes and yogurt

loans.name: Helen Ninoska

texts.es:
Helen tiene 18 años, estudia II año de Ingeniaría Agropecuaria, vive en Ocotal,  sus padres son Comerciantes y ella los ayuda en sus negocios, ellos tienen un Cafetín y un Cyber, decidió estudiar esta carrera por influencia de su hermana, quien obtuvo una beca para estudiar Técnico Forestal.
Ella realizó este préstamo para invertir en compra de Insumos, para un Proyecto de la Universidad para Cultivar Repollo.
Su Principal objetivo es culminar su carrera y ser una empresaria independiente.
texts.en:
Helen, 18, is a second year Agronomy and Cattle Raising student.  She lives in Ocotal.  Her parents are merchants and she helps them in their businesses.  They have a snack bar and an Internet Café.  She decided to study this career influenced by her sister who got a scholarship to become a Forestry Technician.

She negotiated the loan to buy supplies for a university project:  to grow cabbage.

Her main objective is to finish her career and be an independent businesswoman.

loans.use: Agronomy Student Project: Vegetable (Cabbage) Farming.

loans.name: María Susana

texts.es:
María Susana tiene 61 años D. edad, es casada y tiene cuatro hijos ya mayores, resiD. junto a su esposo en el caserío Huambocancha del distrito D. Cajamarca, una zona situada en la sierra norte del país, sus actividades principales son la agricultura y el comercio, se encuentra situada aproximadamente a seis horas D. camino D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo.

Se dedica desD. hace diez años a la venta D. comida en un puesto ubicado dentro del mercado San Sebastián (uno D. los mercados más conocidos D. la zona), ella cuenta con una clientela fidelizada y con los ingresos que percibe D. esta actividad suele ayudar a su esposo con el sostenimiento D. su familia.

María desea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo mas insumos con los cuales pueda ampliar sus ventas y percibir mayores ingresos, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1000 nuevos soles.

María es una mujer bastante responsable y trabajadora. Las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y cariño
texts.en:
María Susana is 61 years old, married and has four grown children.  She lives with her husband in the village of Huambocancha in Cajamarca district, an area in the northern highlands of the country.  Its main activities are agriculture and traD., and it is located about six hours' walk from the city of Chiclayo.

She has been working for ten years selling food from a market stand located within the San Sebastian (one of the most popular markets in the area).  She has a loyal clientele, and with her earnings from this activity she is often able to help her husband in supporting their family.

María wants to grow her business by acquiring more supplies with which she can expand her sales and earn higher income, so has requested a loan of 1000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

María is a very responsible and hardworking woman. People who know her think of her with much esteem and affection.

loans.use: Buying supplies to grow her business (selling food in the marketplace).

loans.name: Luis Abismael

texts.es:
Luis tiene 18 años, estudia II año de Ingeniaría Agropecuaria, vive en Nueva Segovia, desde los 13 años ayuda a sus padres en las actividades agropecuarias y actualmente ellos le ayudan económica y moralmente con la Universidad; Comenzó su propio negocio hace 2 años con la venta de productos lácteos y contrato a alguien por que el comenzó a estudiar.

El realizó este préstamo para invertir en compra de Insumos, para un Proyecto de la Universidad para Cultivar Repollo.

Desea terminar su carrera con buenas calificaciones y dedicarse al sector agropecuario.
texts.en:
Luis,18, is a second year student of Agriculture and Cattle raising.  He lives in Nueva Segovia.  Since he was 13 he has helped his parents with their farming and cattle raising chores and now they give him both economic and moral support at the university.  He started his own business two years ago selling dairy products and hired someone when he started his studies.

He negotiated this loan to invest in supplies for a university project: to grow cabbage.

He hopes to complete his studies with good grades and go into agriculture and cattle raising.

loans.use: Agronomy Students Project: Vegetable (Cabbage) Growing.

loans.name: Sara Orfelinda

texts.es:
Sara tiene 61 años D. edad , es separada y  vive junto a un hijo D. 20 años D. edad en el caserio La Clake, una zona rural que cuenta con una población reducida, aunque tienen energía eléctrica, el agua la aprovechan D. un podo tubular. La principal actividad económica D. la zna es la agricultura y ganadería. Pertenece al distrito D. Reque y se encuentra situado aproximadamente a media hora D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo.

Sara se dedica a la venta D. leña en su vivienda desD. hace mas D. 03 años aproximadamente. Sus principales clientes son las amas D. casa del mismo caserio que utilizan este biocombustible para realizar sus labores diarias D. cocina, además cuenta con algunos clientes que residen en el centro D. la ciudad D. Reque,  Adicionalmente venD. productos D. belleza D. la linea Avon . 

Sara desea ampliar su negocio D. venta D. leña adquiriendo mas mercadería para aumentar sus ventas y percibir mayores ganancias, adicionalmente desea ampliar su negocio D. venta D. cosméticos. Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Ella es una mujer bastante responsable y con muchas ganas D. salir adelante. En la zona las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y respeto.
texts.en:
Sara is 61 years old, separated and lives with her 20-year-old in the hamlet of La Clake.  This is a rural area which has a small population, but has electricity and the advantage of water from an irrigation well.  The main economic activities of the area are agriculture and livestock.  La Clake belongs to Reque district and is located about a half hour from the city of Chiclayo.

Sarah has been selling firewood from her home for about 3 years.  Her main customers are housewives in the same hamlet who use this fuel for their daily cooking tasks.  She also has some clients who live in Reque city center.  In addition, she sells beauty products for Avon.

Sara wants to expand her business selling firewood by acquiring more merchandise to increase sales and earn greater profits. In addition, she wants to expand her business selling cosmetics. To achieve her objective she has decided to request an Edpyme Alternativa loan of 500 soles to help her achieve her goal.

She is a very responsible woman who is eager to advance in life.  People in the area who know her have a lot of esteem and respect for her.

loans.use: Buying firewood to grow her business that sells firewood

loans.name: Judelkis Marlene

texts.es:
Judelkis tiene 18 años, estudia II año de Ingenieria Agropecuaria, vive en condega, sus padres le ayudan a pagar la universidad, su Mamá es Ama de casa y su Papá es conducto, decidio estudiar esta carrera porque le gusta; actualmente recibe una ayuda economica de la Universidad.

Ella realizó este préstamo para invertir en compra de Insumos, para un Proyecto de la Universidad para Cultivar Repollo.

Este credito es muy importante para el porque le ayudara a tener experiencia en su carrera. Desea terminar la carrera y comenzar a trabajar y luego crear su propio negocio.
texts.en:
Judelkis, 18, is a second year Agronomy student.  She lives in Condega.  Her parents help her pay university costs.  Her mother is a housewife and her father is a driver.  She decided on this career because she likes it.  She currently receives some economic support from the university.

She negotiated this loan to buy supplies for a university project: to grow cabbage.

This loan is very important for her because it will help her have experience in her chosen career.  She wants to finish her studies and start to work to later create a business of her own.

loans.use: Agronomy Student Project: Vegetable (Cabbage) Growing.

loans.name: Jordan Ali

texts.es:
Jordan tiene 19 años, estudia II año de Ingenieria Agropecuaria, vive en Esteli, sus padres le ayudan a pagar los gastos universidad,  tiene una beca que se la dio la universidad, siempre quiso aprender acerca de la produccion, agricultura y ganaderia. Nunca a tenido un negocio.

El realizó este préstamo para invertir en compra de Insumos, para un Proyecto de la Universidad para Cultivar Repollo.

Este credito, abre la oportunidad a los estudiantes para aprender la practica en la carrera. Quiere terminar su carrera y le gustaria tener su propio negocio en Ganaderia o Agricultura.
texts.en:
Jordan, 19, is a second year Agriculture and Cattle Raising student.  He lives in Esteli.  His parents help him pay university costs.  He has a scholarship the university gave him.  He has always wanted to learn about production, agriculture and cattle raising.  He's never had a business.

He negotiated this loan to buy supplies for a university project:  to grow cabbage.

This loan opens the opportunity for students to learn the practical side of the career.  He wants to finish his studies and would like to have his own business Cattle Raising or Agricultural business.

loans.use: Agronomy Student Project: Vegetable (Cabbage) farming.

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
La señora Edith S. A. se dedica al comercio de prendas de vestir para mujer, y cosmeticos. ella es joven y estudia para ser protesista dental, pero para poderse costear o pagar sus estudios ella compra mercaderia al por mayor y revende en la ferias de las provincias de Punata y Cliza.

A Edith le gustaria terminar su carrera y luego comprar sus propio equipos para poder ejercer su profesion pero mientras tanto solo vendiendo estos productos logra pagar sus estudios y sus materiales que son muy costosos. Ella desea realizar una especialidad en protesis dental para eso solicitara otro credito. Cuando haya terminado de cancelar en que esta solicitando, que es para comprar un pco de mercaderia aprovechando que se aproximan las fiestas de fin de año, donde tiene mas venta e ingresos.
texts.en:
Señora Edith S. A. trades in women's clothing and cosmetics.  She is young and studying to be a dental technician, but in order to be able to afford and pay for her studies she buys merchandise in bulk and resells it at the fairs in Punata and Cliza provinces.

Edith would like ultimately to move out of this line of business and buy her own equipment to practice her profession, but in the meantime it is only by selling these products that she can pay for her studies and materials, which are very expensive. She wants to get her specialty in dental prosthesis, for which she will request another loan once she has payed off this one. This loan is to buy a small amount of merchandise to give her an advantage in the run-up to the holiday season, when she generates more sales and income.

loans.use: Buying merchandise for her business

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es:
Luis tiene 19 años de edad, estudia II año de Ingenieria Agropecuaria, vive en Condega, Se motivo a estudiar esta carrera porque su familia trabaja en la Agricultura y le gusta mucho el trabajo de campo. Su familia lo apoya en su carrera, su Papá se dedica a la siembra de Tabaco, y en las vacaciones lo ayuda mucho.

El realizó este préstamo para invertir en compra de Insumos, para un Proyecto de la Universidad para Cultivar Repollo.
